title: New Caledonia Balance of Trade
description: New Caledonia recorded a trade deficit of 31282 XPF Million in September of 2022. Balance of Trade in New Caledonia averaged -8452.86 XPF Million from 1995 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 811 XPF Million in July of 2005 and a record low of -31282 XPF Million in September of 2022. New Caledonia reports consistent trade deficits due to food imports. New Caledonia’s main exports are ferroalloys, nickel, iron, fuel, shellfish, scrap metal and fish. New Caledonia’s main imports are fuel, vehicles, pharmaceutical products, coal, automatic data processing machines, turbojets, wine and tires. New Caledonia’s main trading partners are France, Singapore, Australia, Japan, China, South Korea and Spain. This page provides the latest reported value for - New Caledonia Balance of Trade - plus previous releases, historical high and low, short-term forecast and long-term prediction, economic calendar, survey consensus and news.
author: ISEE, New Caledonia
